attributes.additional_details: This needs to happen because too many infants have been lost due to ingesting a button battery and it burning their insides until they die.
attributes.background:
Ban button batteries
Especially in children’s toys/products

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622848

If you'd like these batteries to be banned in all products, you could start a new petition that requests this, rather than focusing on children's toys.
